jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: We are seeking a passionate Frontend Developer to join our fast-growing engineering team. You will work with React, TailwindCSS, and modern tooling to create interactive, scalable, and accessible user interfaces. This role requires strong attention to detail, deep knowledge of component architecture, and the ability to collaborate closely with backend and product teams to deliver features that delight users. You will also participate in code reviews, performance optimizations, and UI/UX discussions to ensure best-in-class experiences.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description: Work on both frontend and backend projects using React and Node.js.

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: Maintain CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure, and monitor system performance.

jobs.title: Mobile App Developer
jobs.description: Develop iOS and Android apps using React Native.

jobs.title: QA Engineer
jobs.description: Write test cases and automate QA pipelines.

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description: Analyze data and build predictive models.

jobs.title: Cloud Architect
jobs.description: Design and maintain scalable cloud infrastructure.

jobs.title: Product Manager
jobs.description: Lead product strategy and manage development teams.
